meanings.definition: To gaze at someone or something with admiration or wonder.
meanings.sent1: She couldn't help begazing at the beautiful sunset.
meanings.sent2: The child was begazing at the stars in awe.
meanings.sent3: The puppy was begazing at the treat as if it held all the secrets of the world.
meanings.sent4: His eyes were begazing at her, as if trying to capture her essence.
meanings.sent5: The artist spent hours begazing at the masterpiece, drawing inspiration.

meanings.definition: The act of looking at someone or something with intense interest or fascination.
meanings.sent1: His begazing of the painting revealed his deep appreciation for art.
meanings.sent2: The begazing of the rare gemstone left everyone mesmerized.
meanings.sent3: The begazing of the cake made it seem almost too good to eat.
meanings.sent4: Her begazing of the bookshelf hinted at her love for reading.
meanings.sent5: The begazing of the night sky filled her with a sense of wonder.
